body_html:
I have exactly the same problem, is there any solution yet?,

In my case I ran the training in colab using GPU, then tested and worked as expected. Later, I changed the session to only CPU (also in colab) and got random words. I also tested it on my local machine and got random words too. I suppose colab has a consistent environment.

In my case I restore the latest checkpoint and I used the provided (seq2seq with attention) example as template.

body:
I have exactly the same problem, is there any solution yet?, 

In my case I ran the training in colab using GPU, then tested and worked as expected. Later, I changed the session to only CPU (also in colab) and got random words. I also tested it on my local machine and got random words too.  I suppose colab has a consistent environment.

In my case I restore the latest checkpoint and I used the provided (seq2seq with attention) example as template.
